description: Field registry for knee MRI prior authorization. Defines all clinical fields that payer policies may evaluate. Fields are domain-specific (knee MRI), not payer-specific. Payer rule files reference these fields by name.

icd10_code.description: ICD-10 diagnosis code(s) documented in chart supporting medical necessity
icd10_code.extraction_hint: Look for ICD-10 codes, diagnosis lines, or assessment sections. May appear as codes (M23.21) or descriptions (meniscal tear).

mcmurray_test.description: Positive McMurray's test documented on physical examination
mcmurray_test.extraction_hint: Look for 'McMurray' in physical exam section. Must be explicitly positive, not equivocal or negative.

thessaly_test.description: Positive Thessaly test documented on physical examination
thessaly_test.extraction_hint: Look for 'Thessaly' in physical exam section. Must be explicitly positive.

joint_line_tenderness.description: Joint line tenderness WITH mechanical symptoms (locking, catching, or giving way)
joint_line_tenderness.extraction_hint: Both components required: tenderness AND mechanical symptoms. Tenderness alone is not sufficient.

persistent_effusion.description: Persistent joint effusion present for more than 4 weeks
persistent_effusion.extraction_hint: Must note duration > 4 weeks or 'persistent'. Acute effusion alone does not qualify.

lachman_test.description: Positive Lachman test documented on physical examination
lachman_test.extraction_hint: Look for 'Lachman' in physical exam. Must be explicitly positive.

anterior_posterior_drawer.description: Positive anterior or posterior drawer test documented on physical examination
anterior_posterior_drawer.extraction_hint: Look for 'anterior drawer' or 'posterior drawer' in physical exam. Either one qualifies.

varus_valgus_instability.description: Instability documented on varus or valgus stress testing
varus_valgus_instability.extraction_hint: Look for 'varus stress', 'valgus stress', or 'collateral ligament instability' in physical exam.

restricted_rom_mechanical_block.description: Restricted range of motion with a documented mechanical block
restricted_rom_mechanical_block.extraction_hint: Both components required: restricted ROM AND mechanical block. Limited ROM from pain alone does not qualify.

xray_completed.description: Weight-bearing radiographs of the affected knee completed
xray_completed.extraction_hint: Look for X-ray, radiograph, or plain film references. Must be weight-bearing (or contraindication documented).

xray_report_available.description: Radiograph report available in the medical record
xray_report_available.extraction_hint: Look for X-ray findings, radiology report references, or imaging results documented in chart.

pt_completed.description: Physical therapy completed (minimum 6 sessions with licensed PT)
pt_completed.extraction_hint: Look for PT notes, physical therapy references, number of sessions. Must be ≥6 sessions.

nsaid_trial.description: NSAIDs or oral analgesics trial completed (minimum 4 weeks)
nsaid_trial.extraction_hint: Look for medication names (ibuprofen, naproxen, meloxicam, etc.), duration of use. Contraindication with alternative satisfies this.

activity_modification.description: Activity modification and documented home exercise program
activity_modification.extraction_hint: Look for activity restrictions, work modifications, home exercise instructions.

bracing_orthotics.description: Bracing, orthotics, or assistive devices (cane, crutches) used
bracing_orthotics.extraction_hint: Look for knee brace, sleeve, crutches, cane, walker references.

injection.description: Intra-articular injection completed (corticosteroid or hyaluronic acid)
injection.extraction_hint: Look for injection references with date, medication name, and response documented.

pediatric_ortho_eval.description: Pediatric orthopedic evaluation by board-certified/eligible pediatric orthopedic surgeon
pediatric_ortho_eval.extraction_hint: Only applicable if patient age < 18. Look for pediatric orthopedic consult or referral.

growth_plate_assessment.description: Growth plate (physeal) assessment included in evaluation
growth_plate_assessment.extraction_hint: Only applicable if patient age < 18. Look for physeal status, growth plate, or skeletal maturity references.

functional_impact_adl.description: Functional impact on activities of daily living documented
functional_impact_adl.extraction_hint: Only applicable if patient age ≥ 65. Look for ADL limitations, functional status, mobility impairment.

surgical_candidacy_assessed.description: Surgical candidacy assessment documented by provider
surgical_candidacy_assessed.extraction_hint: Only applicable if patient age ≥ 65. Look for surgical candidate discussion, operative risk assessment.

acute_trauma.extraction_hint: Look for acute injury, trauma, fall, sports injury, MVA with acute onset.

inability_bear_weight.description: Inability to bear weight at time of evaluation
inability_bear_weight.extraction_hint: Look for non-weight-bearing status, inability to walk, crutch dependence at eval.

suspected_ligament_rupture.description: Suspected complete rupture of major ligament (ACL, PCL, MCL, or LCL)
suspected_ligament_rupture.extraction_hint: Must be suspected COMPLETE rupture, not partial. Look for gross instability, clinical suspicion of complete tear.

displaced_meniscal_tear.description: Clinical findings consistent with displaced meniscal tear (locked knee)
displaced_meniscal_tear.extraction_hint: Look for locked knee, inability to achieve full extension, bucket-handle tear suspicion.

post_op_evaluation.description: Post-operative evaluation required within 6 months of knee surgery
post_op_evaluation.extraction_hint: Look for prior knee surgery reference with need for follow-up imaging.

surgical_date.description: Date of prior knee surgery (required with post_op_evaluation)
surgical_date.extraction_hint: Look for operative date, surgery date. Format as YYYY-MM-DD if possible.

suspected_infection.extraction_hint: Look for fever + joint symptoms, elevated inflammatory markers, turbid aspirate.

suspected_tumor.description: Suspected primary or metastatic tumor of bone or soft tissue
suspected_tumor.extraction_hint: Look for mass, lesion suspicious for neoplasm, bone destruction, night pain with constitutional symptoms.

suspected_occult_fracture.description: Suspected occult fracture not visualized on X-ray
suspected_occult_fracture.extraction_hint: Look for negative X-ray with high clinical suspicion for fracture, point tenderness over bone.

no_clinical_indication.description: No clinical indication or symptoms — routine screening only
no_clinical_indication.extraction_hint: True only if chart explicitly shows no symptoms and imaging is for screening/routine purposes.

isolated_anterior_knee_pain.description: Isolated anterior knee pain (patellofemoral syndrome) present
isolated_anterior_knee_pain.extraction_hint: Look for anterior knee pain, patellofemoral pain, chondromalacia without other pathology.

mechanical_symptoms_absent.description: Mechanical symptoms (locking, catching, giving way) are NOT present
mechanical_symptoms_absent.extraction_hint: True if chart does NOT document any mechanical symptoms. Used with isolated_anterior_knee_pain exclusion.

instability_absent.extraction_hint: True if chart does NOT document instability. Used with isolated_anterior_knee_pain exclusion.

mild_osteoarthritis.extraction_hint: Look for mild OA, early degenerative changes, Kellgren-Lawrence grade 1-2.

surgical_planning_absent.extraction_hint: True if chart does NOT mention surgical planning, pre-op evaluation, or surgical candidacy.

workers_comp.extraction_hint: Look for work injury, WC claim, employer liability references.

declines_surgery.description: Member declines surgical intervention regardless of MRI findings
declines_surgery.extraction_hint: Look for patient refusal of surgery, declines operative treatment.

repeat_mri_within_12mo.description: This is a repeat MRI within 12 months of prior MRI
repeat_mri_within_12mo.extraction_hint: Look for prior MRI references, previous imaging dates within the last year.

no_clinical_status_change.description: No documented change in clinical status since prior MRI
no_clinical_status_change.extraction_hint: True if chart does NOT document worsening, new symptoms, or change since prior imaging.

no_failed_intervention.description: No failed intervention since prior imaging
no_failed_intervention.extraction_hint: True if chart does NOT document failed treatment since last MRI.

no_preop_planning.extraction_hint: True if chart does NOT reference pre-operative planning as reason for repeat MRI.
